msg: MAPREDUCE-4368. Fix TaskRunner to deal with java.library.path with a quoted path on Windows. Contributed by John Gordon.

author: ningjiang
msg: CXF-4407 Fix the issue of Server.start()

author: henrib
msg: Added range operator (x .. y)  and supporting class (IntegerRange);
Added  charset support in JexlEngine & builder options;
Rafactored code for map and array literals (MapBuilder/ArrayBuilder), allow override in JexlArithmetic to customize behavior;
Updated exception handling during parsing,  more precise message and info;
Moved some tests from 'issues' to arithmetic;

author: acmurthy

author: acmurthy
msg: MAPREDUCE-4332 Fix command-length abort issues on Windows. Contributed by Ivan Mitic.
